研究人员发现瘦素耐药性背后的神经机制和一种逆转的方法自1990年以来，全球肥胖率已经翻了一番以上，现在有近十亿人属于该类别。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/researchers-discover-neural-mechanism-behind-behind-reptin-resistance-and-resistance-and-a-way-way-way-way-way-to-redverse-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/researchers-discover-neural-mechanism-mechanism-behind-leptin-reptin-resistance-and-resistance-and-a-a-way-way-way-to-reverse-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43920084-B2A0-43F8-AD7F-8C303FD9C60D Tue, 04 Mar 2025 11:58:04 -0500 Researchers discover neural mechanism behind leptin resistance and a way to reverse it
母乳喂养六个月可能会刺激有益的肠道细菌，与降低儿童血压有关至少六个月的护理可能会刺激有益的肠道细菌，这些肠道与多年后的心脏健康相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/breastfeeding-for-six-months-months-may-spur-bens------------------------------------------------ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/breastfeeding-for-six-months-months-moy-spur-ben-------------------------------------------------- xcomment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5EB741C5-014C-4482-9245-D7047875604C Tue, 04 Mar 2025 11:53:16 -0500 Breastfeeding for six months may spur beneficial gut bacteria linked to lower childhood blood pressure
研究发现了葡萄糖在肠道中排泄的如何转化为有益的脂肪酸被认为仅以饮食纤维为食的肠道微生物也从我们的胆量中喂食糖，它们从中产生短链脂肪酸，这对于许多身体功能至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/study-uncovers-how-glucose-xcreted-in-the-the-gut-converts-into-into-bene-bene-bene-fatty-acids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/study-uncovers-how-glucose-ecreted-in-the-the-gut-converts-into-into--into-bene-benefty-fatty-acids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cc01520-0fd4-4a2d-b702-b702-323912e2e6f6 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 11:46:35 -0500 Study uncovers how glucose excreted in the gut converts into beneficial fatty acids
学校缺勤可能表明孩子的功能性胃肠道疾病新的UVA Health Children's Research发现，经常因腹部投诉而经常因腹部抱怨而错过上学的儿童更有可能患有肠道轴的疾病，例如肠易激综合征，而不是可以通过医疗检查检测到的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/school-absenteeism-could-indicate-functional-gi-disorders-in-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/school-absenteeism-could-indicate-functional-gi-disorders-in-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1feb12a-8a63-4714-97Be-b177Ad94d94d2cd Tue, 04 Mar 2025 11:35:25 -0500 School absenteeism could indicate functional GI disorders in kids
新型策略靶向2型糖尿病中的β细胞功能障碍纽约西奈山医学院的研究人员发现了一种新的方法，可以保护产生胰岛素的β细胞免受糖脂肪毒性的破坏作用 - 与2型糖尿病的进展有关的有害状况（T2D）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/novel-strategy-targets-beta-cell-dysfunction-in-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/novel-strategy-targets-beta-cell-cell-dysfunction-in-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7f1fe17d-f77d-4232-bd66-f66-f8f477d443e1 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 11:31:04 -0500 Novel strategy targets beta cell dysfunction in type 2 diabetes

研究确定铁是中风相关细胞死亡过程的关键驱动因素缺血性中风在全球的死亡和长期残疾中继续排名。尽管急性治疗（如凝块检测和溶栓的进步）的进步有所改善，但管理再灌注损伤的挑战（当恢复的血液流动可能造成讽刺意味的是脑组织的阶段）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/research-indistifies-iron-iron-as-cucial-cucial-driver-stroke-stroke of-stroke-STROKE-cell-cell-cell-cell-cell-deph-processes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/research-indistifies-iron-iron-aas-cucial-clucial-driver-stroke-stroke-cell-cell-cell-cell-cell-cell-dept-processes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf3d56f1-C696-4475-9975-1496AF102363 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 11:07:47 -0500 Research identifies iron as crucial driver of stroke-related cell death processes
